title: Fixed spacing issue with the build script.
message:
Fixed spacing issue with the build script.

The build script provided too much spacing for the physical device id.
This commit ensures that the spacing matches the spacing on other lines
(equivalent number of tabs for each line in the block of code).

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated build and versioning information to v1.1.0.
message:
Updated build and versioning information to v1.1.0.

In addition, the submodule repositories have been updated and the
AndroidManifest now prevents NodeActivity from rebuilding the entire
activity on orientation changes. All updates are taken care of manually
on orientation changes. Additionally, all submodule repositories have
been updated.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Moved the JavaScript src load to the end of the body tag in the WebView.
message:
Moved the JavaScript src load to the end of the body tag in the WebView.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Made physical device ID optional in build script.
message:
Made physical device ID optional in build script.

Previously the build script did not allow you to continue without the
device ID being set. Since this is not needed to successfully build the
application, it has been made optional.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated NodeActivity and optimized the WebView and its video support.
message:
Updated NodeActivity and optimized the WebView and its video support.

JavaScript is used for updating the WebView on orientation changes,
font size changes, etc. Videos have thumbnail images displayed. If
the native youtube app is not available, the link will be launched
as if it were a normal link to the youtube video.

Also, the JavaScript and CSS has been isolated into their own files.
Padding is now applied using browser CSS instead of directly onto the
WebView.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Fixed progress indicator invisibility bug.
message:
Fixed progress indicator invisibility bug.

The progress indicator did not appear in previous builds whenever the
ShopActivity was loaded. This was because the progress indicator was
dark and the background is black. This has been fixed and the progress
indicator is now light.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Created a DBUpgradeTask which creates a worker thread for DDL execution.
message:
Created a DBUpgradeTask which creates a worker thread for DDL execution.

Since all database setup and upgrades occur via DDL statements stored in
local files, complex setups may take a little bit longer. This will
create a worker thread for these setup and upgrades ops. The user will
see a notification on the screen stating that an upgrade is in progress
and an indeterminate progress indicator is displayed.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Removed hard-coded database path reference.
message:
Removed hard-coded database path reference.

Different devices may now actually have a different database path than
other devices. So now we no longer rely on a hard-coded reference.
Instead, we execute DDL statements using the Android API.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added license header to custom WebView file.
message:
Added license header to custom WebView file.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added video-embedding support.
message:
Added video-embedding support.

Some content may be based on video or may be entirely composed of video.
Thus, video embeds allow for this.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Changed the node TextView to a WebView.
message:
Changed the node TextView to a WebView.

WebView allows for much more flexibility in terms of how content is
presented, so by switching to WebView, we can benefit from these
features (image and video embeds, html, css and js, etc).

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated InApp Billing API, which fixes some crashing bugs.
message:
Updated InApp Billing API, which fixes some crashing bugs.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Removed extra variable from NodeDatabase.java
message:
Removed extra variable from NodeDatabase.java

The extra variable was previously used in debug logging for
determining array size for the sql DDL file statements. It is no longer
needed.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated the application so that it can generate database and all updates
message:
Updated the application so that it can generate database and all updates

The application will now generate the database on first launch as
opposed to being pregenerated. This will allow for easy updates in the
future via change scripts. Precautions have been taken for all users who
have previously installed the application with the pre-generated
database.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated NodeActivity to use the ToggleButton.
message:
Updated NodeActivity to use the ToggleButton.

NodeActivity now uses the ToggleButton for bookmarks. It will display a
plus when a bookmark is not yet added to the database, and a minus when
a bookmark is currently in the database. Thus, this button represents
the available action they can take on a bookmark.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated various files for v1.0 release.
message:
Updated various files for v1.0 release.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated build script for cross-compatibility.
message:
Updated build script for cross-compatibility.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Minor fixes for each file.
message:
Minor fixes for each file.

Added more detail to script README, removed extra files from gitignore,
updated custom rules to include LICENSES and added more detail to the
build.sh script itself. The build.sh script also now does it's updates
non-destructively via sed backups.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added project management scripts.
message:
Added project management scripts.

The scripts/ directory will contain scripts that ease project
management.

build.sh prepares the project to be compiled right after a git clone.
There are a few components the application contains that are specific
to developers (e.g., public keys) and thus, these components cannot be
committed. Users can use build.sh to input there custom components and
then they should be able to build the application.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added custom ant build rules tailored for this project.
message:
Added custom ant build rules tailored for this project.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added project.properties file.
message:
Added project.properties file.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated libs submodule commit reference.
message:
Updated libs submodule commit reference.

The updated submodule contains the Google Admob jar file.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated license headers for every source file. Added urls.
message:
Updated license headers for every source file. Added urls.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added urls to common project files.
message:

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added the database schema file.
message: Added the database schema file. To create the actual database, run the following command: sqlite3 creepypasta_files.db < creepypasta-files.sql This will provide the necessary schema for creepypasta files. To add stories, simply use standard insert commands. To reference images, add the image to the Raw folder and use a standard HTML tag. For example: Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez

title: Added all source files.
message:
Added all source files.

ShopActivity's public key is not being committed, so technically, this
makes Creepypasta Files not fully functional at start up.

Beyond this, the application SHOULD work if a public key is provided.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Updated submodule commit reference.
message:
Updated submodule commit reference.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Fixed README file to reference Creepypasta Files.
message: Fixed README file to reference Creepypasta Files.

title: Added standard Android project files.
message:
Added standard Android project files.

The Android Manifest contains the overall structure of the app, declares
device compatbility and defines the necessary permissions to run the
app. The other files are used at build time.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added common project files.
message:
Added common project files.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>

title: Added .gitignore file.
message: Added .gitignore file.

title: Added resources and dependencies submodules.
message:
Added resources and dependencies submodules.

By splitting the resources directory and the libs directory into their
own seperate repos, we can manage the inevitable bloat of each
repository by isolating the bloat by type.

This has tradeoffs, but the point is to be able to download source code
quickly without the need of pulling in dependencies or resources.

Signed-off-by: Byron Sanchez <bfs5030@gmail.com>
